metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5296 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an uncontrolled memory allocation in the PdfParser::ReadXRefSubsection function (base/PdfParser.cpp). Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
